title: Description of Ionian City Zhyunia
body:
So, I am curious what the Port city of Zhyunia, the major city in the province of Zhyun, looks like. I imagine it is made up of docks on the outer rim where the city then flows into a mass of buildings that merge with the forest and the plains before it reaches the base of the mountain. 

I am not that great with architecture so if any of you guys have thoughts, or a developer can answer this, that would be great.
